title: How to Make Vegan Vegetable Soup

steps.headline: Combine all the broth ingredients in a large soup pot and stir them until they are well combined.
Bring the ingredients to a low boil.
Add the carrots, celery, cabbage and potatoes and simmer the soup for 20 to 30 minutes or until the potatoes are soft.
Add the cauliflower and broccoli to the mix and cook them for an addition 5 to 10 minutes or until the vegetables are soft when pierced with a fork.
Add the greens and the parsley and cook them until they are just wilted but still bright green.
Top them with a drizzle of flax oil and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.

text: Combine all the broth ingredients in a large soup pot and stir them until they are well combined.  Bring the ingredients to a low boil.  Add the carrots, celery, cabbage and potatoes and simmer the soup for 20 to 30 minutes or until the potatoes are soft.  Add the cauliflower and broccoli to the mix and cook them for an addition 5 to 10 minutes or until the vegetables are soft when pierced with a fork.  Add the greens and the parsley and cook them until they are just wilted but still bright green.  Discard the bay leaves.  Ladle the soup into bowls.  Top them with a drizzle of flax oil and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.  Finished.
